body.p: Town in Marshall County, Kentucky, 2 1/2 miles north northeast of Benton. Founded by James Brien in 1819 or 1820. Briansburg's post office established on May 1, 1856. Incorporated in 1861. Became a prosperous commercial town but later declined.
